name: Overall Hit Rate Over Time (by window)
query: select run_at, window_days, avg(hit_rate) as hit_rate from public.analysis_windows where job_type = 'six_hour' and run_at >= now() - interval '7 days' group by run_at, window_days order by run_at;

name: Overall New Slots vs Window (latest run)
query: with latest as (select max(run_at) as run_at from public.analysis_windows where job_type = 'six_hour') select window_days, sum(new_count) as new_count from public.analysis_windows aw join latest l on aw.run_at = l.run_at where aw.job_type = 'six_hour' group by window_days order by window_days;

name: Overall Median Duration Over Time (daily summary)
query: select run_at, window_days, avg(median_duration_min) as median_duration_min from public.analysis_windows where job_type = 'daily_summary' and run_at >= now() - interval '30 days' group by run_at, window_days order by run_at;
